DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the sample for pharmacokinetic or other correlative study was collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A type of study that tests for a relationship between a condition and a potential causal factor of the condition._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Studies designed to translate basic science findings into clinically useful tools.  Includes marker research.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A type of study that tests for a relationship between a condition and a potential causal factor of the condition.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering something together.

Concepts.definition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2023.6.5 Released. ak 3/23/2023:versioned to replace the retired concept. wz

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

DataElement.changeDescription: PBTC_WMS_050114 8/5/16 wms - CDE was versioned to 1.1 with updated human readable definition and friendly short name.
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 3/23/2023: versioned to replace the retired DEC. wz
